word: I can tell you we can feed not only the sheep, but also the lambs. Three times Christ asked the impetuous Peter, "Simon, son of Jonas, lovest thou Me?" (John 21:15-17). He said, "Yea, Lord." Peter was to feed not only the sheep but also the lambs, those who need to have tenderness shown them. Brethren, can we do it? "If you love Me, feed My lambs." We want a deeper understanding of the love of God.
